statements: SELECT * FROM MachineMaintenanceRecords;
SELECT machine_id, maintenance_date, technician_name FROM MachineMaintenanceRecords;
SELECT machine_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_description FROM MachineMaintenanceRecords;
SELECT technician_name, maintenance_date FROM MachineMaintenanceRecords ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT machine_id, maintenance_type FROM MachineMaintenanceRecords WHERE maintenance_type = 'Scheduled';
SELECT * FROM MachineMaintenanceRecords WHERE maintenance_type = 'Scheduled Maintenance' ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT machine_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_description FROM MachineMaintenanceRecords WHERE technician_name LIKE '%John%'
SELECT machine_id, maintenance_type, technician_name, maintenance_date FROM MachineMaintenanceRecords ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM MachineMaintenanceRecords WHERE maintenance_type = 'Emergency Repair' AND maintenance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31'
SELECT technician_name, COUNT(*) AS maintenance_count FROM MachineMaintenanceRecords GROUP BY technician_name HAVING maintenance_count > 5
SELECT * FROM machine_maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_type = 'Scheduled Maintenance';
SELECT machine_id, maintenance_type FROM machine_maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM machine_maintenance_records ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT machine_name, manufacturer FROM machine_inventory WHERE installation_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT machine_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_description FROM machine_maintenance_records WHERE machine_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM machine_maintenance_records WHERE machine_id = 123 ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;

SELECT machine_name, maintenance_date, maintenance_type FROM machine_inventory JOIN machine_maintenance_records ON machine_inventory.machine_id = machine_maintenance_records.machine_id WHERE maintenance_type = 'Routine';

SELECT machine_name, maintenance_date, maintenance_type FROM machine_inventory JOIN machine_maintenance_records ON machine_inventory.machine_id = machine_maintenance_records.machine_id WHERE machine_name LIKE '%Printer%' ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;

SELECT machine_name, manufacturer, COUNT(*) as total_maintenance_records FROM machine_inventory JOIN machine_maintenance_records ON machine_inventory.machine_id = machine_maintenance_records.machine_id GROUP BY machine_name, manufacturer;

SELECT machine_name, installation_date, maintenance_description FROM machine_inventory LEFT JOIN machine_maintenance_records ON machine_inventory.machine_id = machine_maintenance_records.machine_id WHERE maintenance_description IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM machine_maintenance_records;
SELECT machine_name, machine_location FROM machine_info;
SELECT engineer_name, specialization, experience_years FROM maintenance_engineers;
SELECT record_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_date, maintenance_description FROM machine_maintenance_records ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT engineer_name, specialization, experience_years FROM maintenance_engineers WHERE experience_years > 5;
SELECT * FROM machine_maintenance_records;
SELECT machine_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_description FROM machine_maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_type = 'Scheduled Maintenance';
SELECT engineer_id, engineer_name, specialization, experience_years FROM maintenance_engineers ORDER BY experience_years DESC;
SELECT machine_id, machine_name, last_maintenance_date FROM machine_info WHERE machine_location = 'Factory A' ORDER BY last_maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT machine_id, machine_name, machine_location, last_maintenance_date FROM machine_info JOIN machine_maintenance_records ON machine_info.machine_id = machine_maintenance_records.machine_id;
SELECT * FROM machine;
SELECT machine_id, machine_name, location FROM machine ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_record WHERE maintenance_type = 'Preventive Maintenance';
SELECT machine_id, MAX(installation_date) AS latest_installation_date FROM machine GROUP BY machine_id;
SELECT part_name, part_quantity FROM spare_parts WHERE part_quantity > 0 ORDER BY part_quantity DESC, part_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM machine;
SELECT machine_name, location FROM machine WHERE installation_date IS NOT NULL ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_record WHERE maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01' AND maintenance_type LIKE 'Preventive%' ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT machine_name, location, maintenance_type FROM machine JOIN maintenance_record ON machine.machine_id = maintenance_record.machine_id ORDER BY machine_name, location;
SELECT machine_name, part_name, part_quantity FROM machine JOIN spare_parts ON machine.machine_id = spare_parts.part_id WHERE part_quantity > 5 ORDER BY part_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM machine_info;
SELECT machine_name, installation_date FROM machine_info WHERE machine_id = 1;
SELECT machine_name, manufacturer FROM machine_info WHERE installation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_records ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT task_name, estimated_duration FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE estimated_duration > 60;
SELECT * FROM machine_info WHERE machine_id = 1;
SELECT machine_name, manufacturer FROM machine_info WHERE installation_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT machine_name, last_maintenance_date FROM machine_info WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Corp' ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT m.machine_name, s.next_maintenance_date, t.task_name FROM maintenance_schedule s JOIN machine_info m ON s.machine_id = m.machine_id JOIN maintenance_tasks t ON t.task_id = s.schedule_id;
SELECT mf.fault_description, mi.machine_name FROM machine_faults mf JOIN machine_info mi ON mf.machine_id = mi.machine_id WHERE mf.fault_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY mf.fault_date DESC;
